title: [Basilica Platform, First Level]
description: The irregular shadows of night darkened ruins spread out to the southeast of the pyramid.  Wide stone steps lead down to the streets below.  Another set of steps leads further up the sides of this pyramid.

Positioned above all the single story buildings of the city, it is possible to see the damage that time has wrought.  Several blocks to the southeast can be seen a long roofless building.  Wide stone steps lead down to the streets below.  Another set of steps lead up to the second story of the pyramid.
